pkgmetadata.longdescription: django-pin==========django pinterest like apllication Installation------------Requirements:: pip install -r requirements.txtTo install:: pip install django-pin Then add ``pin`` to your ``INSTALLED_APPS``:.. code:: python INSTALLED_APPS = ( ... 'pin', 'django.contrib.comments', 'django.contrib.humanize', 'django.contrib.flatpages', 'daddy_avatar', 'sorl.thumbnail', 'taggit', 'compressor', ... )In your urls.py:.. code:: python urlpatterns = patterns('', url(r'pin/', include('pin.urls')), # other urls ... )Live demo--------- http://www.wisgoon.com/pin/ http://www.shiastock.com/
